name: Yggdrasil's Depths
description:
The mighty tree Yggdrasil is cursed ! Its roots are polluted by evil entities. Adventurer, your slaying skills are needed. Dig through the core of Yggdrasil and free the tree from this nightmare !

 --- 

CONTROLS : 

MOVEMENTS : Arrow Keys || JUMP : Space Bar || ATTACK : Control Key || RETURN : Respawn

---

This game is an entry for Global Game Jam 2023.

The main inspiration was The Legend of Zelda : Link's Awakening on Gameboy.
